mapper.select: SELECT p.project_no, p.project_title, t.task_title, tf.task_no, t.task_status FROM task_favorite tf JOIN task t ON tf.task_no = t.task_no JOIN project p ON t.project_no = p.project_no WHERE tf.member_no = #{member_no}

SELECT t.task_no, t.task_title, t.task_register_date, t.task_status, m.name, m.profile_path, m.profile_name FROM task t INNER JOIN project p ON t.project_no = p.project_no INNER JOIN member m ON t.member_no = m.member_no WHERE t.project_no = #{project_no} ORDER BY t.task_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS row_count FROM task t INNER JOIN project p ON t.project_no = p.project_no WHERE t.project_no = #{project_no};

SELECT t.task_no, t.task_title, t.task_register_date, t.task_status, t.task_start_date, t.task_end_date, t.task_content, m.member_no, m.name, m.profile_name, m.profile_path, f.file_no, f.file_type, f.file_name, f.file_path FROM task t INNER JOIN member m ON t.member_no = m.member_no LEFT JOIN attached_file f ON t.task_no = f.task_no WHERE t.task_no = #{task_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attached_file f INNER JOIN task t ON f.task_no = t.task_no INNER JOIN project p ON t.project_no = p.project_no WHERE p.project_no = #{project_no}
